backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining storage, access control, data models, maps, and activity tracking for ponds, posts, ribbits, tags, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI spacing change across multiple frontend pages with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router setup defining all routes, wrapped in a theme provider with toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button using bookmark state hooks with click prevention for card navigation.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a comment display component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file for an emoji reactions component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with links to About, All Ponds, and Settings plus attribution and styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, mobile menu, search UI, create menu, and avatar handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapping pages with header, footer, and mobile sidebar drawer that closes on navigation.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation with active route highlighting and recent activity list loading.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post card with avatar, title, image, stats, and like/share interactions using various data-fetching hooks.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Provides a mobile slide-in drawer for the left sidebar with scroll-lock and overlay handling.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows detailed pond info including stats, moderators, and join/leave controls with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Renders a mobile pond header with banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a single ribbit reply with nesting, likes, avatar, timestamp, and a reply form.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Displays trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts using data from global queries.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a fullscreen mobile search modal showing trending terms, suggestions, and a search input with actions.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under the search bar showing trending searches or suggestions based on the query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with activity counts in a right sidebar layout.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrapper components for tab lists and triggers with underline-themed classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helpers to add, remove, and check bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query currently matches using a reactive hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with the backend actor to fetch and mutate ponds, profiles, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats numbers into short units like k, M, and B with one-decimal rounding.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates, normalizes, and provides errors for alphanumeric-only pond names.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks plus toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns optional error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, IDs, Froggy Phrase storage, and settings backup via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily view cooldown tracking using timestamps in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders About page describing Ribbit, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with join status, loading states, and links to start or view ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: React page for creating a lily with text, image, or link, handling ponds, tags, validation, previews, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Page for creating a pond with name, description, images, and froggy phrase validation, including preview and submission.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a create-post page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage displaying lilies with trending/new sorting, search handling, sidebars, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with ribbits, likes, views, image lightbox, and view-count increment logic.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond info, moderators, metadata, join state, and allows leaving the pond.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond's feed, fetching pond data, lilies, and membership status, with join actions and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty file content provided; no implementation to summarize.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows locally bookmarked lilies, loading each lily by ID and allowing removal of missing or saved items.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Renders a hub displaying top, trending, and newest tags with loading states and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with sorting and canonical-tag redirection, including loading and sidebar layout.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Manages user settings including username changes, avatar uploads, froggy phrase recovery, joined ponds, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, containers, and plugins for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, and a pending request to remove bottom margin from tab components.
